sentences.en: Each flowerbed is populated with those classic English garden decorations: little statues of gnomes.
sentences.cn: 他们各自的花圃开的花布满了那些传统英式花园，这些花就是地精的塑像。

sentences.en: He grows tulips in the flowerbed in his garden.
sentences.cn: 他在他花园的花坛里种植郁金香.

sentences.en: He put his great foot on the flowerbed.
In one of our attacks the regiment ran into an almost insurmountable obstacle: enemy fire coming from an emplacement camouflaged as a flowerbed was mowing down the lines of our infantrymen.
sentences.cn: 在一次进攻中我们团遇到了一个几乎无法逾越的障碍：敌人从伪装成花圃的掩体中向我军步兵射击打乱了其队形。

sentences.en: Little Tom embedded several seeds in the flowerbed.
sentences.cn: 小汤姆在花圃里种下了几颗种子.

sentences.en: The dog left the flowerbed at sixes and sevens.
sentences.cn: 这条狗把花坛践踏得乱七八糟.

trans.tran_en: an area of ground, for example in a garden, in which flowers are grown
